nodes.text: This individual was the Imperial sector governor of the Lahara sector during the early portion of the Galactic Civil War, shortly before the Battle of Yavin. This Imperial sector governor paid a group of bounty hunters, including the Trandoshan Bossk, in advance for the capture of a group of Wookiee slaves, including Chewbacca, who were attempting to set up a safe colony on the moon Gandolo IV. Bossk's group ultimately failed to capture the fugitive Wookiees.

In each source in which this character is referenced, the character is only referred to ambiguously as the Imperial governor of the sector in which Gandolo IV is located. The 2009 release of The Essential Atlas confirms Gandolo IV to be located in the Lahara sector, and so this article asserts that this character is the Imperial governor of the Lahara sector.

The 1998 PC game Star Wars: Rebellion places Gandolo IV in the Moddell sector, which has since been overridden by The Essential Atlas and its related online content on StarWars.com. Therefore, this character should not be mistaken as the Imperial governor of the Moddell sector.
